name: CICD | FUNC | (Slack) Manage User Role
description: When there is a function call, do action and other actions

block.name: call_recipe
block.description: Call CICD | FUNC | User Permission Analyzer

properties.label: Method
properties.name: method
properties.hint: GET, POST, PUT or DELETE.  For PUT method, "role" is mandatory.

block.name: block_kit_modals
block.description: Open a modal view as Slack Workbot and wait for user input

elements.text: =_('data.workato_recipe_function.fe984ce3.result.entries.first.____Size', 'list_meta', '____Size', 'data.workato_recipe_function.fe984ce3.result.entries') > 0 ? "*NOTE:* Please select only one option from above. If both are selected, then existing role choice is given preference." : "*NOTE:* Kindly, enter the name of the role to be created."

properties.hint: GET, POST, PUT or DELETE.  For PUT method, "permission" is mandatory.
